colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES THUB PA CHEN PO BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BSRUNG BZLOG PA GSUM GYI NYAL CHOG @006A *, ,'DI ZLA BA YAR NGO'I TSES DRUG BCU DRUG NYI SHU DRUG DANG, MAR NGO'I TSES DGU BCU DGU NYER DGU NYIN MOR KHA 'DON DU BGYIS NA GRANGS NI TSAR NYER GCIG GAM BDUN BRJOD NA LUS DAG YID GSUM BSRUNGS BA DANG 'GAL RKYEN PHYI NANG GI BAR CHAD SDANG DGRA PHYOGS NGAN PA THAMS CAD PHYIR BZLOG PA DANG, TSE DANG BSOD NAMS DBANG THANG 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO, ,BAN BON SDONG GIS MTHU BSGRUBS KYANG BDE MOR NYAL CHO GO ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
